hero.title: Building What Matters, <green>Powered by AI.</green>
hero.subtitle: Innovation in progress.
hero.description: Hi, I'm <name>Harold</name>. I view technology not as a moat or a barrier, but as a <green>wrench</green> to fix what's broken. I use AI to automate the repetitive, allowing me to focus on solving my own challenges—and then helping those facing the <green>same problems.</green>
hero.description2:
Instead of narrowing cognitive gaps in large hierarchies, I choose to spend my energy on rapid creation and crafting

seamless experiences.

terminal.toeflair: TOEFLAIR: Optimizing interactions and iterating on the 'writing' module...

toeflair.description: Your AI-powered TOEFL speaking tutor. Practice anytime, anywhere with real-time feedback and scoring based on official rubrics.
